Postdoc in Artificial Intelligence
The Uncertainty in Artificial Intelligence group of Eindhoven University of Technology seeks a postdoctoral researcher to enhance our strengths in research and education.
Five positions: Assistant/Associate/Full Professor in AI
We seek to hire five open-rank faculty members to expand our academic staff in the area of Artificial Intelligence (AI). A minimum of two of these positions are eligible for the Ir√®ne Curie Fellowship. Applications will start to be screened immediately.
